projectGridLines.stationName: GTM Buddy Software private limited - Data science
projectGridLines.title: AI for Sales Success
projectGridLines.description:
Description: SOTA AI capabilities to help Sales Reps win more deals by providing

insights and recommendations on next best actions.

Skill sets: Generative AI, NLP, Machine Learning, Python.

Traits expectation: Strong Analytical Skills:, Programming Proficiency, Data Wrangling

Skills, Machine Learning & NLP Fundamentals, Adaptability & Team Play

Expected learning: You will learn how to leverage AI to build data products

Specific courses required for project execution: Should have attempted

certifications/courses relevant to AI/ML and should have basic level of understanding on

related topics w.r.t programming and the DS/ML concepts
